# ➕ Aware Helpful

As aware, you will be notified in the nexting if a revealing role interacts with you.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Aware that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Aware
  • Impostors can become Aware
    • ON: Impostors can become Aware
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become Aware
  • Crewmates can become Aware
    • ON: Crewmates can become Aware
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become Aware
  • Neutrals can become Aware
    • ON: Neutrals can become Aware
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become Aware
  • Knows the role of player
    • ON: Aware knows the role of the player
    • OFF: Aware does not know the role of the player
Contribute to this page on GitHub! open in new window
